name: Runner Adventure (ahimite)
description:

But it's not the case for you today, Welcome to "Runner Adventure", so be ready for a jumpy game experience. Jump games has a classic in arcade jumping game-play, with stunning and clean graphics and sounds.

Why are you still reading this and wasting your time. It's time to stop reading and start downloading this free jumping adventure. Oh you want some more details about it? Here you go then!

How to Play Runner Adventure:

It's simple to play but hard to master, you have to be a good player to master it. Touch the up row to jump, and the down row to get down, And try to avoid anything danger.That's all.

Feature of Runner Adventure:
